document_data.mainbody:
ort was a young crewmember aboard the hammership, the Probe.
As a young man of about 20 years of age when Teldin Moore met him in 1361 DR, Lort was extremely thin. He had a hardened look to him like many a mercenary.
One of Lorts duties on the Probe was to help man the forecastle ballista turret.
On the journey from Krynn to Toril, the Probe encountered a void scavver while Lort was at his gunners post with a woman named Preema. On its first attack, the shark-like monster nearly bit Preemas arm off. When the scavver charged a second time, Lort drew his short sword and tried to plunge it into the scavvers head, but the monster twisted its head rapidly at the last moment and took the young man into its mouth, consuming him whole after several bloody bites. Teldin Moore recovered Lorts dropped sword and used the weapon to slay the monster with the assistance of his magical cloak.
